title: Enable Language Server
description: Use the gopls language server for enhanced functionality. The gopls command should be installed in your search path, or you can specify the full path below.

title: Language Server Command
description: The command name to start the gopls language server. Use an absolute path here if gopls is not in your search path.

children.title: Use Placeholders
children.description: Enables placeholders for function parameters or struct fields in completion responses.

children.title: Hover Kind
children.description: Controls the information that appears in the hover text. SingleLine and Structured are intended for use only by authors of editor plugins.

children.title: Link Target
children.description: Controls where documentation links go.

children.title: Local Imports
children.description: The equivalent of the goimports -local flag, which puts imports beginning with this string after 3rd-party packages. It should be the prefix of the import path whose imports should be grouped separately.

children.title: gofumpt
children.description: Use gofumpt for formatting

children.title: Completion Documentation
children.description: Enable documentation with completion results

children.title: Complete Unimported
children.description: Enable completion for packages that you do not currently imported

children.title: Deep Completion
children.description: Enable the ability to return completions from deep inside relevant entities, rather than just the locally accessible ones.

children.title: Completion Matching
children.description: Sets the algorithm that is used when calculating completion candidates.

children.title: Symbol Matching
children.description: Sets the algorithm that is used when finding workspace symbols.

children.title: Symbol Style
children.description: Controls how symbols are qualified in symbol responses.

children.title: Hover Links
children.description: Toggles the presence of links to documentation in hover.

children.title: Temporary mod File
children.description: Controls the use of the -modfile flag in Go 1.14.

children.title: Import Shortcut
children.description: Specifies whether import statements should link to documentation or go to definitions.

children.title: Verbose Work Done Progress
children.description: Controls whether the LSP server should send progress reports for all work done outside the scope of an RPC.

children.title: Semantic Tokens
children.description: Controls whether the LSP server will send semantic tokens to the client.

children.title: Expand Workspace to Module
children.description: instructs gopls to expand the scope of the workspace to include the modules containing the workspace folders. Set this to false to avoid loading your entire module. This is particularly useful for those working in a monorepo.

children.title: Multi-module Workspaces
children.description: Opts a user into the experimental support for multi-module workspaces.

children.title: Diagnostic Delay
children.description:
Controls the amount of time that gopls waits after the most recent file modification before computing deep diagnostics. Simple diagnostics (parsing and type-checking) are always run immediately on recently modified packages.

This option must be set to a valid duration string, for example "250ms".

children.title: Package Cache Key
children.description: Controls whether to use a coarser cache key for package type information to increase cache hits. This setting removes the user's environment, build flags, and working directory from the cache key, which should be a safe change as all relevant inputs into the type checking pass are already hashed into the key. This is temporarily guarded by an experiment because caching behavior is subtle and difficult to comprehensively test.

children.title: Verbose Output
children.description: Enables additional debug logging.

children.title: Enable RPC trace
children.description: Turns on gopls RPC tracing in the extension console.
